title: Mac OS FPS Bug
body: I have an iMac and i play everyday. Until yesterday i was playing at 180 fps, but now i am not able to get over 60fps while going to lane and 20 fps when there is another champion in my screen. I tried uninstaling and installing again, checking my computer and everything works fina and other games run just fine aswell. I`d like to know if someone can tell me{{summoner:6}}  what can i do to fix this. No matter i uncap fps or leave it at 60-144, it would stick at 60 and  lag. Thanks for the help.{{champion:238}}

replies.body: I used to have 144 and up. Now I'm locked at 60 yo. (mac)
Loads of mac users are getting it
Same problem! Pls spam tickets, need to make them work!
This is a known issue that we've been investigating, and it mostly involves some mac players getting locked at 60 fps.  Is this still an issue for you?

Yes this is a problem for us! After the FPS patch, a 2-fold drop is a problem for us! 3 days of silence from Riot is a problem for us! Please work, you have already been told that the problem is in full-screen mode (why was there anything to change in technical terms)?

You can lose your players ... And then it will be a problem for you....

This is the second time in two years that a patch which straight up doesn't work on Mac has been released and in neither case has there been a hotfix. (It took over two weeks in the other case; in that case, the new HUD straight crashed Macs.)
Same Problem Here and im using a laptop

Hello everyone, I would like to comment as well; I dont have a MAC computer, but Im getting the exact same issues you're all mentioning here. Just as of today I mean, 2 FPS? In teamfights and in laning phase too.

I didn't know other people were getting this problem. As of the new patch I've been getting 60 fps maximum, around 40 fps while laning, and around 20 fps in team fights. Changing my settings makes no difference, I still get the same issue at "Very Low" as I do at "Medium" settings...
